Weather: Heavy showers, thunderstorms approach as strong winds buffet country https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-heavy-showers-thunderstorms-approach-as-strong-winds-buffet-country/ETYYM2IYJZA73DIDBYAIH7EIJQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-heavy-showers-thunderstorms-approach-as-strong-winds-buffet-country/ETYYM2IYJZA73DIDBYAIH7EIJQ/ Raphael FranksAuckland will see fresh southwesterlies on Tuesday, a partly cloudy day with showers.
